title: Can we have a QSS for AP please
body: Can we have a QSS for AP or at least make zhonya usable while in CC because I hate having to buy Scimitar on my AP champ it's a waste. Thankyou!

replies.body: I needed a good laugh today, thanks OP.
QSS never even used to build into anything and people would still get it and now that it does build into something that's just a bonus.
The whole point of zhonya's is to use it to prevent CC lmao
